CARD1.TITLE: Quickly Review and Assess
CARD1.DESC: Evaluate your assignments quickly with the support of artificial intelligence. All you need to do is download and assess the files.

CARD2.TITLE: Get Fastest and Most Accurate Results
CARD2.DESC: Get rid of manually checking each assignment. Let artificial intelligence handle it for you and provide the most accurate grades.
CARD2.VIDEO: How to Get Most Accurate Results?

CARD3.TITLE: Discover an Easy and User-Friendly System
CARD3.DESC: Assign and upload assignments effortlessly, and the system will automatically grade them. You just need to download the grade file.
CARD3.VIDEO: How to Use the Easy and User-Friendly System?

CARD1.TITLE: Assignment Management
CARD1.DESC: Define and manage your assignments and their requirements. Grade your students based on the given criteria.

CARD2.TITLE: Quick Assessment
CARD2.DESC: Evaluate the assignments you give with the support of artificial intelligence. Just download the generated file.

CARD3.TITLE: Multiple Class Support
CARD3.DESC: Create a class for any software-related course. Assign your assignments and let artificial intelligence handle the rest.

CARD1.TITLE: Why IntelliGrade is the Best?
CARD1.DESC: With the support of artificial intelligence, you can evaluate assignments quickly. AI algorithms can automatically grade students' assignments and speed up the evaluation process. This allows teachers to save time.

CARD2.TITLE: AI-Powered Quiz System
CARD2.DESC: An advanced tool that enables teachers to create interactive and engaging quizzes for their students. This system allows teachers to input specific topics and generates customized quizzes based on those topics using AI algorithms.

CARD3.TITLE: AI-Powered Assignment System
CARD3.DESC: An innovative tool that provides teachers and students with a user-friendly, effective, and reliable assignment management experience. This system makes it easy for teachers to define, assign, and track assignments. Students can upload, edit, and track their assignments.

CARD4.TITLE: AI-Powered Notification System
CARD4.DESC: An innovative system that assists students in their academic studies by suggesting appropriate questions, academic articles, and research sites based on their classes and assigned assignments. This system utilizes AI algorithms to support students in learning and acquiring knowledge more effectively.

ABOUT_US.MAIN_DESC: What sets us apart is our commitment to providing teachers and students with a user-friendly, effective, and reliable assignment management experience. Here are some of the features that differentiate us from other systems: Comprehensive Assignment Management, where teachers can easily define, assign, and set deadlines for assignments. AI-Powered Quick Assessment, where AI algorithms automatically analyze and grade student assignments, allowing teachers to spend less time grading and students to receive quick feedback.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.SUB_TITLE: You can always get in touch with us
CONTACT.DESC: We would be delighted to hear from you whether it's about contributing to our project, sharing your ideas, or asking any questions. We aim to provide our teachers and students with a user-friendly, effective, and reliable educational management experience, and your feedback is highly valuable in this process.

LOGIN_REGISTER.NAME: Full Name
LOGIN_REGISTER.LOGIN_DESC: We are excited to have you here. Register now and join us.
LOGIN_REGISTER.REGISTER_DESC: Log in now and enjoy the unique features of IntelliGrade.
